text: reposting this here in case b2c folks have insight: <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1623410949271200> cc <@U020KA3MCFQ>

attachments.fallback:
[June 11th, 2021 4:29 AM] georgiab: Hi everyone! Happy Friday :sunny:
I'm looking for some advice on review platforms! :sunglasses:

We are an online only gardening retailer and we in a bit of a sticky situation with our review platforms and I'm looking for some advice on which platforms have worked best for any of you in the ecommerce space?
We love YOTPO but have been forced to invest more in trustpilot post pandemic and although their functionality and customer service isn't as good as YOTPO, we have to keep investing because their presence is so large and well recognised.

Anyone in the same boat? :boat: Would you advise consolidating to one review platform or potentially using Trustpilot for service reviews + yotpo for products + UGC?

Thanks in advance! :pray:
